The Kitchen

Create a gaming profile or profolio, share posts and get connect with other gamers.

Register Login

About This Project

I'm made this project to practice on my MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) development and also to make a website for me and my friends. The point of this project is not to make any money. Its just to show that I can use these technologies proficiently. So feel free to register and make your own profile. Which you can add your favorite games, programming lanauges, add and comment on posts, and much more... (not really that's basically it).
